portada.subTitle: Original de Courflix
portada.title: Ver temporada 111
portada.description: Una ansiada luna de miel. Un asesinato terrible. Varios sospechosos. Si sobreviven, serán unas vacaciones de ensueño.

series.subTitle: Original de Courflix
series.title: Ver temporada 1
series.description: Lorem lorem romree  Un asesinato terrible. Varios sospechosos. Si sobreviven, serán unas vacaciones de ensueño.

epiInfo.contentDesc: A former piano prodigy is about to discover that a seemingly small event can drastically alter the direction of a person's life.
Kousei gets tricked into going to a performance by his close childhood friend and in that performance he starts to regain a shred of his passion.
Kousei's friends work together to try to convince him to accompany Kaori at her next recital.
Kousai being Kaori's accompanist appears to be a bad idea.
Kaori is hospitalized after the competition. Kousei thinks deeply that playing the piano is the only way he can live. Tsubaki gets asked out by her senior she had admired before.
